EmailTemplate.name: 17.Security.Endpoint.Malware.N.M.E.13339.South Africa Security.Email 1 - ES On D
EmailTemplate.subject: IoT device threats - are you protecting your customers?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Security you can rely on from Nokia Security for IoT. Are you protected? While the Internet of Things (IoT) presents significant opportunities, our increasingly connected world also carries with it mounting security threats. In this on-demand webinar, we discuss:
- IoT device threats and recent cyberattacks; growing trends - How to detect and mitigate IoT malware - Deployment scenarios of Nokia Endpoint Security protecting end-users and IoT devices
With regards, Deon Geyser, Market Unit Head, Nokia South Africa Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
